name: The Voices Games Extra Collection
description:
A collection of 4 short games from The Voices Games

Ayleouna in the Terrifying Wooden Space Station

A short horror game set in a space station where the bio synthesizers have ran amock and are creating monstrosities intent only on destruction.

3rd person shooter gameplay, kill all the enemies to progress to the next level.

Tizzy vs The Aliens

Tizzy the egg shaped hero has been abducted by aliens and must escape by any means necessary in this action platformer.

Clear the levels by dodging the hazards, jumping on enemies and reaching the exit.

I See Me

A second person perspective game where you view the action from the perspective of a monster who is chasing you, Run away and reach the exit.

Tunnel Flyer

Fly your trusty aeroplane down tunnels dodging obstacles and shooting enemies.
